input_text:
Job Title: Warehouse Associate I (Perishable)

Location: Elloree, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Address: USA-SC-Elloree-258 Snider Street

Store Code: DC 30 Dist Genl & Admin (7294694)

ADUSA Distribution is the distribution company of Ahold Delhaize USA, providing distribution services to one of the largest grocery retail supply chains in the nation. ADUSA Distribution receives, stores, manages inventory, and ships fresh and non-perishable product throughout the network of local brand stores. ADUSA Distribution facilities handle a mix of product types, including fresh, frozen, grocery and health and beauty care items. Our team is supporting the supply chain network evolution to an integrated self-distribution model of the future, serving leading omnichannel grocery brands â€“ Food Lion, Giant Food, The GIANT Company, Hannaford and Stop & Shop. To learn more about our company and the other supply chain companies of Ahold Delhaize USA, visit www.adusasc.com.

Primary Purpose

As a Warehouse Associate, you will be responsible for performing distribution center shipping/receiving functions. In doing so, you will be an essential part of moving product accurately and safely throughout the Distribution Center.

Duties And Responsibilities

Perform any shipping and receiving tasks that may be assigned by supervisor or appropriate designeeComplete all documents related to shipping and or receiving tasks assignedSelect and palletize grocery, produce, meat, frozen food and dairy orders for shipment to retail stores accuratelyOperate pallet jacks, forklifts, and other material handling equipment in a safe and efficient mannerPerform pre-operational check of pallet jacks or forklifts according to company policyFollow good sanitation practices; keep work area clean and free of debrisMake recommendations for modifications to procedures or processes impacting work group or distribution center that will maximize efficiency, productivity, and reduce costs

Qualifications

Certified on powered industrial equipment where applicableAble to use a personal computer for data entry and research purposesHighly motivated self-starter and team player with strong attention to detail and the ability to prioritize multiple task in a fast paced environmentHigh School EducationFamiliarity/experience in a distribution environment

Preferred Requirements

Ability to reach, stoop, bend, and lift up to and including 80 lbs. repetitivelyAbility to meet production standards set by the companyAbility to stand for long periods of timeAbility to read and understand written and numeric product identifiersMust be able to work needed schedule to perform assigned dutiesWork in a warehouse environment with varying conditions (i.e. cool temperatures, concrete floors, powered industrial trucks)

We are an organization that values diversity and encourages all qualified individuals to apply without regard to sex, race, color, ancestry, national origin, citizenship status, religion, age, marital status (including civil unions), military service, veteran status, pregnancy (including childbirth and related medical conditions), genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, legally recognized disability, domestic violence victim status or any other characteristic protected by law. Our organization is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities, including applicants. If you have a disability and require assistance in the application process, please email recruiting@adusasc.com

Job Requisition: 358986_external_USA-SC-Elloree_4182024

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
